name: Potion Production
hint: The [Potion house] is running out of [[[potions]. They need ingredients to produce potions for Pacifica people.

name: Manuscripts
hint: There are [[[manuscripts] in the [Library] that are not yet published because they need stock of papers for producing so.
objective: Gather [[[30 quality leaves] from a light green [Mob].

name: Habulan Memories
hint: [[Eric] reminisce his habulan moments. He used to collect [[[trophies] but got halted since he started working in the [Shop].

name: SOS Training
hint: There is rumored upcomming [[[[SOS Tournament] but it is only [[Alfred], the game organizer, who can decide who are going to compete.

name: Locker Keys
hint: [[John] lost the [[[keys] while picking up bulk items from the [Field].
objective: Find [[12 storage keys]. A mamal on the [Field] might found and took it.

name: Woods for Chivalry
hint: The [Chivalry] needs spare [[[woods] for making basic armors and weapons.
objective: Gather [[[24 woods] from a hard shelled Mob on the [Field].

name: Sinews for Chivalry
hint: [[[Sinew] is the most essential material needed for crafting [[[bows]. The [Chivalry] are looking for volunteers who can provide those.
objective: Gather [[[36 sinews] from a pink mob outside the [Fortress].

name: I Like [[Lady Maya]
hint: [[John] wants to make Lady [[Maya] happy thats why he wanted to create a special gift for her, however, he need help because he couldn't manage to leave his task in their [Shop].

name: I Like [[Lady Mariane]
hint: [[Eric] needs materials to create [[[purple flower crown] for Lady [[Mariane].

name: I Like [[Mikaela]
hint: There is an existing [[[[good friendship bond] between [[Mikaela] and [[Ricky] since their childhood but what [[Ricky] feels is beyond what [[Mikaela] knew and believe. He is planning to create something for her together with a [[[love letter] written by him with all of his heart.

name: But I Like [[Mikaela] Too
hint: [[Razor] acts weird, I think he's planning something for [[Mikaela].

name: Focus [[Ricky] Focus!
hint: [[Ricky] suddenly discovered that [[Mikaela] likes [[Razor] but not him. He is deeply saddened and don't want to talk to anybody. He needs someone to give advice on how to get along with his life.

name: The Family Picnic
hint: [[Joshua] is planning to cook something special for his familiy picnic.

name: Sticky Gels
hint: There are [[[[jelly-type] monsters producing [[[adhesive gels] that was discovered to be efficient tool of [[Rangers] in training.

name: Dad's Pendant
hint: [[Pete] lost his Dad's precious pendant somewhere in the [Swamp].

name: Warp Orbs
hint: [[Purified spirit stones] are used to make warp orbs. [[Zen] needs them to provide warp services. This attracts a specific undead monster.

name: Jackets
hint: [[[Jackets] are in demand in [[Ricky's] shop. However, he needs more materials to provide the supply and demand of his [Shop].

name: Potion Experiment
hint: [[George] is currenlty experimenting a different kind of potion but the [[[main ingredient] for doing so is located in a wild and dangerous place he couldn't manage to go.

name: Mines
hint: [[[Mines] are essential to [[Rangers] especially during [[[[wars]. The [Potion house] needs your help in creating them.

name: Swamp Potions
hint: George needs another [[[stock of potions] from Mikaela in [Potion house]
objective: Bring the [[[potion delivery box] from Mikaela to him without getting trouble with monsters

name: Pillow
hint: The [Inn] usually replaces their [[[pillows] on every customer going for a sleep.

name: Waif Camp Potions
hint: [[Alfred's] shop have few potions remaining. He need to get stock from [Potion house] but he can't leave his shop alone.

name: True Bound Swordsman
hint: A sentimental valued item of [[Rafaga] just got lost.

name: The Stolen Ornament
hint: Help [[Lady Maya] look for the stolen item from the [inn].
objective: Find the missing [[[Golden bee ornament] at the [Swamp] (map 0 to 20)

name: Save Little Parurus
hint: Look for [[Mitto]'s missing serene pack to cure sick Parurus.
objective: Find 5 [[[Wild serene flowers] at the [Grassland] (map 0 to 20)

name: Delicate Delicacy
hint: Something's missing from [[Alfred]'s recipe.

name: Beauty in the Sky
hint: [[Mikaela] watched a meteor shower with [[Ricky]
objective: Find the [[[Meteoric stone] at the [Field] (map 0 to 20)

name: Mommy Paruru Went Lala
hint: Someone just nab Paruru eggs out of [[Shoruru]'s nest. Who's this NPC?
objective: Find out who's the man on Chaleco who nabbed [[Shororu]'s  2 Missing [[[Egg de paruru]s.

name: Cash Collection
hint: [[Lloyd] lost his debt list and couldn't remember who's on the lost List.
objective: Collect 15 [[[Cash collection]s from [[Lloyd]'s [[NPC] friends around [Pacifica]. Find out who are these [[NPC]s

name: Ah Yay Yay! My Little Muffy Fly
hint: [Grassland village] needs something to grow crops faster during dry season.
objective: Find 3 [[[Echo stone] from [[Muffy flies] near the [Field] bounderies going to [Swamp].

name: Pipe Master @name
hint: [Fortress] is having a pipeline problem. They need you to fix it!
objective: Find the broken pipelines and fix it. [[Eric] gave you a [[[Pipe tools].

name: Finishing Flare Day
hint: [[Darus] has been chosen to put [[[Flare stone]s around [Pacifica] indoor shops for the Flare day event. Now he asked you to help him remove the flares.
objective: Find all [[[Flare stone] in all indoor shops. Look carefully for something ignited.

name: Mistery Case 1
hint: Someone broke the [Potion house]'s window last night. [[Mikaela] wants you to invistigate.
objective: Find who broke [[Mikaela]'s window. Investigate all NPCs at the fortress and compile their [[[Alibi report].

name: Find Mi Snuggies!
hint: [[Mikaela] lost her snuggies on while delivering potion to [[Rafaga] so you need to get it for her or she will again sleep walk.
